text: module gripes: no module not at top-level, combined with modules being the only way to properly contain all bindings

elements.text: module gripes: no module not at top-level, combined with modules being the only way to properly contain all bindings

text: You can use Module() to create an anonymous module, bind it to a local variable and then use Core.eval or @ eval to put stuff in it.

elements.text: You can use Module() to create an anonymous module, bind it to a local variable and then use Core.eval or @ eval to put stuff in it.
